response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, is valued at $1,000,000 to us due to its unique features and the extensive research and development it has undergone. Given its immense worth to you, we are extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000.

This exceptional opportunity not only allows you to secure the product at a significant discount but also ensures a long-term partnership with our company, offering unparalleled support and customization services. We are confident that this investment will pay dividends in terms of productivity, innovation, and market advantage.

Please let us know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision. We look forward to the possibility of working closely with you on this exciting endeavor.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
